scripts.pack-plugin: rm -rf ./vendor; composer install --no-dev; rm -rf ./node_modules; npm ci; npm run build; npm pack
scripts.postpack-plugin: pkgDir=${PWD/*\//};pkgName=$(npm list --depth 0 | sed 's/@/-/g; s/ .*//g; 1q;'); tar zxf ./$pkgName.tgz; mv ./package $pkgDir; zip -qr releases/$pkgName.zip ./$pkgDir; rm -rf ./$pkgName.tgz ./$pkgDir; rm -rf ./vendor; composer i
